nodejsMissing.title: Node.js environment missing
nodejsMissing.message: Node.js environment not detected, please install Node.js and try again. Recommended version: {{minVersion}} or higher.

nodejsVersionLow.title: Node.js version too low
nodejsVersionLow.message: Current Node.js ({{nodePath}}) version is {{nodeVersion}}, please upgrade to {{minVersion}} or higher for better compatibility.
